about.title: 热爱科技
about.info:
我是一个居住于温尼伯热衷于科技的程序猿

From front end web and mobile development with React and React Native, to backend API's running Rails, ExpressJS. I have experience with LAMP and MEAN stacks, as well as cloud solutions like Google Cloud Platform and Firebase. Over the years I have developed a deep understanding of computer science and have applied myself in both theoretical and practical applications.

我酷爱生活 学习及科技

discover.title: 热爱探索
discover.subtitle: 我相信研究和发现
discover.intro: [zh] I don't just write code. I write accessible code. Software development is my never ending journey. Therefore, I advocate for clean code, agile development, and innovative technologies to provide a modern, fast, and accessible product.
discover.summary: [zh] I don't wait for the future. I make it. Swipe left to learn more about where I have worked and what I do.
